// connection request!
send> 21 
recv< 15 05 

// read RTC (Zeit nicht gesetzt, blinkt!)
send> 55 17 17 AA 
recv< 06 01 
send> 55 12 12 AA 
recv< 06 
send> 01 44 00 00 
recv< 06 
send> 02 FB 00 
recv< 06 03 FB 00 01 
send> 02 FB 01 
recv< 06 03 FB 01 01 
send> 02 FB 02 
recv< 06 03 FB 02 03 
send> 02 FB 03 
recv< 06 03 FB 03 00 
send> 02 FB 04 
recv< 06 03 FB 04 00 
send> 02 FB 05 
recv< 06 03 FB 05 00 
// 01-01-2013, 00:00, Su (Sontag)

// read firmware
send> 55 17 17 AA 
recv< 06 42 
send> 02 1F 02 
recv< 06 03 1F 02 42 // Ident = 0BA5
send> 02 1F 03 
recv< 06 03 1F 03 56 // V
send> 02 1F 04 
recv< 06 03 1F 04 32 // 2
send> 02 1F 05 
recv< 06 03 1F 05 30 // 0
send> 02 1F 06 
recv< 06 03 1F 06 32 // 2
send> 02 1F 07 
recv< 06 03 1F 07 30 // 0
send> 02 1F 08 
recv< 06 03 1F 08 32 // 2
V2.02.02

// read password
send> 02 1F 02 
recv< 06 03 1F 02 42 
send> 55 17 17 AA 
recv< 06 42 
send> 01 47 40 00 
recv< 06 
send> 02 1F 00 
recv< 06 03 1F 00 04 
send> 02 1F 01 
recv< 06 03 1F 01 00 
send> 02 48 FF 
recv< 06 03 48 FF 40 
send> 05 05 66 00 0A 
recv< 06 
recv< 57 49 54 52 45 00 00 00 00 00 5D
// WITRE, XOR = 5D

// Display at power-on
send> 02 05 52 
recv< 06 03 05 52 FF // DateTime
send> 02 05 52 
recv< 06 03 05 52 01 // I/O

send> 05 08 00 00 40 
recv< 06 
recv<
01 00 4D 65 6C 64 65 72 20 31 2F 31 20 20 00 00
01 00 46 6C 75 72 20 45 47 20 20 20 20 20 00 00
05 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 20 20 20 00 00
06 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 20 20 00 00
14

// Analog output in mode STOP
send> 05 05 53 00 05 
recv< 06
01 00 00 00 00
01
// AQ = Last
// XOR


// Programmzeilenspeicher
send> 05 0E E8 00 40 
recv< 06
2A C0 12 80 84 83 00 00
2D 40 12 80 FF FF 32 40
1E 40 00 00 34 40 00 00
00 00 00 00 02 00 0C 80
0E 80 0F 80 10 80 FF FF
34 40 01 00 01 01 00 00
34 40 02 00 02 02 00 00
34 40 03 00 03 03 00 00
B3

// inkl. "Watch" auf B001 (Vor-/Rückwärtszähler) (On = 3, Off = 6, R=0, Dir=0)
send> 55 13 13 01 0A AA 
recv< 06 
recv< 55 11 11 4A 00
3E C9 11 2A
0A // 10 extra Bytes
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00

AA

// B001 (Ein-/Ausschaltverzögerung, TH = 0:03m, TL = 10:01s)
// @STOP
send> 05 0E E8 00 0A 
recv< 06
2F 40 00 00 03 80 E9 43 00 00
46
// @RUN
send> 55 13 13 01 0A AA 
recv< 06 
recv< 55 11 11 46 00
22 8D 11 2A
06 // 6 extra Bytes
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 50
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
00 00 00 00 00 00
AA

               .---.Ba
    .----------| & |
    |       .--|   |-- Q1
    |       |  '---' 
I1--o   I2--o
    |       |  .---.Bb
    |       '--|>=1|
    '----------|   |-- Q2
               '---' 

// B001=AND, B002=OR, I1 an B1, I2 ans B2, Q1 an B1, Q2 an B2
recv< 55 11 11 40 00 E6 09 11 2A 00 00 ... 50 00 00 00 00 ...
recv< 55 11 11 40 00 E6 09 11 2A 00 02 ... 50 01 00 00 02 ...
recv< 55 11 11 40 00 E6 09 11 2A 00 03 ... 50 03 00 00 03 ...
recv< 55 11 11 40 00 E6 09 11 2A 00 02 ... 50 02 00 00 02 ...
// B001=AND, B003=OR, I1 an B1, I2 ans B3, Q1 an B1, Q2 an B3
recv< 55 11 11 40 00 E7 09 11 2A 00 04 ... 50 02 00 00 02 ...
recv< 55 11 11 40 00 E7 09 11 2A 00 05 ... 50 03 00 00 03 ...
recv< 55 11 11 40 00 E7 09 11 2A 00 00 ... 50 00 00 00 00 ... 
// B001=AND, B017=OR, I1 an B1, I2 ans B17, Q1 an B1, Q2 an B17
recv< 55 11 11 40 00 F5 09 11 2A 00 00 00 01 ... 50 02 00 00 02 ...
// B018=AND, B027=OR, I1 an B18, I2 ans B27, Q1 an B18, Q2 an B27
recv< 55 11 11 40 00 10 0A 11 2A 00 00 00 02 04 ... 50 03 00 00 03 ...
// B008=AND, B130=OR, I1 an B8, I2 ans B130, Q1 an B8, Q2 an B130
recv< 55 11 11 40 00 6D 0A 11 2A 00 80 ... 52 03 00 00 03 ...

send> 55 13 13 00 AA 
recv< 06 
recv< 55 11 11 40 00
6D 0A 11 2A
00
80 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 52
03 00 00 03 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
AA 


//-----------------------------------------
// Testprg. "Ermittlung von Speicherbedarf"
//-----------------------------------------
// Schaltprogramm
send> 05 0E E8 00 4C 
recv< 06
02 00 0B 80 FF FF 01 00 FF FF FF FF // OR
01 00 0C 80 FF FF FF FF 0D 80 FF FF // AND
24 40 F2 00 A0 00 36 01 FF FF FF FF FF FF 2A 0E 00 00 00 00 // Wochenschaltuhr
21 40 00 00 7A 80 00 00 // Einschaltverzögerung
31 C0 0F 80 0F 80 0F 80 01 80 00 00 // Treppenlichtschalter
01 00 02 00 03 00 FF FF FF FF FF FF // AND
C9 

// B004 (Einschaltverzoegerung, Zeit 2:02m) => nicht gestartet
